cycleDaysModal.title: Copy days
cycleDaysModal.description: If you filled some days in a trip you can copy them onto other days to avoid filling the same data manually. Choose how many days you want to copy, what days are destinations, and press "Copy" button.
cycleDaysModal.tip: For example you have selected copying days 3–5 into days 8–13. In this case day 8 will be filled with day 3 data, day 9 with day 4 and etc.
cycleDaysModal.overlappingRanges: Source and target days are overlapping. Make sure you are not copying days into themselves.
cycleDaysModal.overwriteTip: If you choose the option all the data in target days will be removed and replaced. This operation could not be revert back.

addModal.intro: Amount of products is specified per one person in a group. Total amount will be calculated automatically.
addModal.title: Add product

errorModal.title: Connection error
errorModal.text: Something gone wrong. Try to reload a page.

editModal.massDescription: How much the piece weighs in grams. You can use fractional values.
editModal.noteDescription: Sum of all nutrient masses must not exceed 100 grams
editModal.errorEmptyName: Product name must not be empty and not longer than 100 characters
editModal.errorWrong: Enter a positive number higher than 0.1

products.title: Products
products.cardText: If you cannot find something suitable in the database you can add your own product. Just fill the information about its nutrients.

trips.sharedInfoTitle: Someone shared this trip with you
trips.title: Trips
trips.cardText: Open a new page in your story by clicking a button below. This is easy.
trips.jumbotronText: We have found out that you do not have any planned trips. The whole world is waiting, let's start exploring it together!
trips.jumbotronText2: Let's start from the button. We will ask for a little portion if information, it does not take long.

shareModal.title: Share a trip
shareModal.typeSelectorTitle: People with this link will be able to edit the trip.
shareModal.additionalInfo: Share the link with other tourists to let them view or edit your trip. The link is valid for 3 days from the moment of creation.

editModal.nameInvalidFeedback: Trip name must not be empty and not longer than 50 characters.
editModal.groupConfigSubhelp: Group is a amount of people who eat from one cooking pot
editModal.groupErrorMessage: Enter a positive number higher than 0

copyModal.title: Copy a trip
copyModal.nameInvalidFeedback: Trip name must not be empty and not longer than 50 characters.

archiveModal.title: Archive a trip
archiveModal.text: Are you sure you want to archive this trip?
archiveModal.error: Something went wrong. Try to reload a page.

signup.title: Register
signup.passwordError: Password must be at least 8 characters long
signup.wantedToLogin: Wanted to sign in instead of sign up?

forgot.title: Restore password
forgot.instructions: Enter emails address you'd used when you registered an account. Then follow the instructions from an email.
forgot.firstLineSuccess: Password reset link has been sent to your email.
forgot.secondLineSuccess: If you didn't receive an email, please check your spam folder.

login.title: Login
login.wantedToSignup: Wanted to sign up instead of sign in?

reset.title: Reset password
reset.text: Enter new password. It must be at least 8 characters long.
reset.passwordError: Password must be at least 8 characters long
reset.error: Something went wrong. Try to reload a page.

shopping.title: Shopping list
shopping.cardBody:
The best way to use this report is to print it.
Print the list and take it with you to the store. This way you won't forget anything.
We left you some space for notes in case something goes wrong.

deleteModal.title: Delete a user?
deleteModal.text: Warning: this action cannot be undone!
deleteModal.text2: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.vacuumDbDesc: Remove all unused data from the database.
maintenance.reindexTripsDesc: Reindex trips table to avoid broken indices and impossible to reach data.
